data.name: Train Simulator: Frankfurt High Speed: Frankfurt – Karlsruhe Route Extension Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Route Extension

The Frankfurt High Speed: Frankfurt – Karlsruhe Route Extension Add-on brings extensive additional inter-city rails to the highly popular Rhine Railway: Mannheim - Karlsruhe Route Add-On, making over 130 kilometres of intense, high-speed action! You must own The Rhine Railway: Mannheim - Karlsruhe Route Add-On, which is a separate purchase, in order to play the content featured in this Route Extension.


About the Game

Delve into a new high-speed experience for Train Simulator with Frankfurt High Speed, which brings famed Inter-City Express traction into Germany’s 5th largest city, and you get to experience the heart of the action at captivating velocities.

130 years old, Frankfurt am Main Hbf marks the start of your incredible journey. With 24 surface-level platforms, and daily passenger figures averaging at 450,000, Frankfurt am Main Hbf represents the pinnacle bustling, modern city termini.

Heading south, you traverse the scenic and bustling Riedbahn – being one of the many hundreds of trains that use the line each day – racing non-stop through agricultural land and regional stations aboard the modern DB BR 406 ICE 3M, before arriving at the immense and complex layout of Mannheim, which includes Germany’s 2nd largest freight yard. From there, Inter-City Express services join the dedicated high-speed line to Karlsruhe, giving passengers a memorable ride at 280 km/h.

Another key duty is to connect the hub to its airport, so from the cab of the ICE 3M you will also pick up travellers from afar at Frankfurt am Main Flüghafen and take them to the city centre. Bringing the ICE 3M’s into service when required is a natural operation, so you will get to know the Frankfurt am Main area within no time.

Of course, local stations are frequently served by Regional and S-Bahn traffic, and such is the case here with the fit-for-purpose DB BR 425. Weave in-between the high speed action and perform vital services out of Mannheim Hbf, and when on the classic line to Karlsruhe, be sure to keep an eye out for the significant freight traffic which will accompany you.

Stretching across the Rhine Valley and the Hessian Ried, Frankfurt High Speed: Frankfurt – Karlsruhe is a definitive and landmark arrival in Train Simulator.

Included Scenarios


The Frankfurt High Speed: Frankfurt – Karlsruhe Route Extension includes seven career scenarios featuring Deutsche Bahn ICE and S-Bahn passenger activities as well as a selection of railfan scenarios.

  • [406] 01. The Ried to the Rhine
  • [406] 02. Reaching the Terminal
  • [406] 03. The ICE Maiden
  • [406] 04. Putting it on ICE
  • [406] 05. Upon the Riedbahn
  • [425] 06. Warming the Track
  • [425] 07. The Winterbahn
  • [RailfanMode] Frankfurt am Main Stadion
  • [RailfanMode] Neulußheim

Please Note: The Rhine Railway: Mannheim – Karlsruhe Route Add-On is required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Click here for Steam Workshop scenarios.

Key Features


  • Features the 77 km route from Frankfurt am Main Hbf to Mannheim Hbf, which combined with the existing Mannheim Hbf to Karlsruhe Hbf, reaches an overall 137 km
  • The route to Frankfurt am Main Flüghafen is included
  • DB BR 406 ICE 3M in DB ICE livery
  • DB BR 425 in DB Regio Red livery
  • DB BR 189 in DB Traffic Red livery
  • DB BR 294 in DB Traffic Red livery
  • 7 Career scenarios
  • 2 Railfan Mode scenarios
  • Quick Drive compatible
  • Download size: 225.5mb

Please note that Frankfurt High Speed is a highly detailed route and you will be required to adjust your in-game settings to get the best possible experience. Please consult the accompanying user manual for detailed instructions.

data.short_description: Stretching across the Rhine Valley and the Hessian Ried, Frankfurt High Speed: Frankfurt – Karlsruhe is a definitive and landmark arrival in Train Simulator.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 40 GB HD space
  • Sound: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics: Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
